CustomField.formula: CASE( Deliver_To__c, "RDC", TEXT(RDC_Location__c) , "Service Center", Service_Center_Name__r.Name & BR() & Service_Center_Street_Address__c & BR() & Service_Center_City__c & ', ' & Service_Center_State__c & ' ' & Service_Center_Zip__c , "Customer", Opportunity__r.Account.Name & BR() & Opportunity__r.Account.BillingStreet & BR() & Opportunity__r.Account.BillingCity & ', ' & Opportunity__r.Account.BillingState & ' ' & Opportunity__r.Account.BillingPostalCode, "Nothing Selected to Deliever To")
CustomField.label: sys Delivery To
